description:

Call 9388 9473 for details on member, address and etc.

contact.name: Shannon Ong

description: Low income Indian Muslim family is requesting for new or second-hand (good condition) Spice Grinder (small/medium size) for their cooking needs as their current one is spoilt. They use Spice Grinder for their cooking needs daily. Both client and her husband are not working due to health concerns and dependent on financial support and donor's assistance. name: Jeans
description: Client is a father to 3 daughters aged 10, 4 and 8 months. description: Client is an expectant mother who will be raising her child by herself. She has limited family support and also has financial challenges after being terminated from her job midway through her pregnancy. Hence, Client needs help with securing baby essentials before the birth.

description:
Client is a single mother, has mental health issues and is on long-term MC. Family is facing a financial strain and she is unable to purchase a new school shoes for her secondary 1 child. 

While the shoe is still wearable, it appears to be torn and tattered and the child will benefit from getting a new pair of school shoes. 

Would appreciate if child can receive a BATA voucher to purchase a new school shoe for self.

Thank you!
